title: Meeting House Secret
creator: Leasure, Al
description:
"Sh-hh! It's his until he finds us!"

	"Bah!  I'm tired of this game!  I'm going to Rush Holt's meeting!"

	"Ray for Rush!"

	(Meeting house secret)

	(Well known bag co.)

	("PA")
